title: POLARITY THERAPY: Overview, Uses, Side Effects, Precautions, Interactions, Dosing and Reviews
description: Learn more about POLARITY THERAPY uses, effectiveness, possible side effects, interactions, dosage, user ratings and products that contain POLARITY THERAPY.
cleaned_text: Overview Polarity therapy is used for [fatigue](https://www.webmd.com/women/why-so-tired-10-causes-fatigue), stress, cancer-related [fatigue](https://www.webmd.com/sleep-disorders/ss/slideshow-fatigue-causes-and-remedies), [fibromyalgia](https://www.webmd.com/fibromyalgia/understanding-fibromyalgia-basics), [chronic fatigue syndrome](https://www.webmd.com/chronic-fatigue-syndrome/what-is-chronic-fatigue-syndrome)(CFS), and many other conditions, but there is no good scientific evidence to support these uses. How does it work ? Uses & Effectiveness Insufficient Evidence for - Tiredness in people with cancer. Early research shows that polarity therapy might reduce tiredness and improve quality of life in women who are receiving [radiation therapy](https://www.webmd.com/cancer/what-to-expect-from-radiation-therapy)for [breast cancer](https://www.webmd.com/breast-cancer/understanding-breast-cancer-basics). But it doesn't seem to work better than [massage therapy](https://www.webmd.com/balance/massage-therapy-styles-and-health-benefits). - Stress. Early research shows that polarity therapy can reduce levels of stress in people who take care of adults with [dementia](https://www.webmd.com/alzheimers/types-dementia). [Fatigue](https://www.webmd.com/women/rm-quiz-fatigue-something-else). - Anxiety. - Depression. - Osteoarthritis. - Pain. [Fibromyalgia](https://www.webmd.com/fibromyalgia/ss/slideshow-fibromyalgia-overview). - Chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS). - Other conditions. Side Effects Special Precautions and Warnings [breast](https://www.webmd.com/women/picture-of-the-breasts)-feeding: There isn't enough reliable information to know if polarity therapy is safe to use when pregnant or breast-feeding. Stay on the safe side and avoid use. Interactions We currently have no information for POLARITY THERAPY overview. Dosing [bipolar](https://www.webmd.com/bipolar-disorder/understanding-bipolar-disorder-basics)contact, which involves applying both hands to the body at once, with each hand on an "opposing location". Other techniques might include movements and [exercise](https://www.webmd.com/fitness-exercise/ss/slideshow-7-most-effective-exercises)called polarity [yoga](https://www.webmd.com/balance/the-health-benefits-of-yoga), nutrition or dietary changes, and [counseling](https://www.webmd.com/balance/video/farrell-therapy-counseling). Some of these methods can include practices similar to reflexology, [chiropractic](https://www.webmd.com/back-pain/chiropractic-pain-relief), cranial sacral therapy, and others.
